ЁЯОУ
Nalanda University

He founded the world-famous Nalanda University (Mahavihara), which later became a center of Buddhist education.

ЁЯУЬ
Most Inscriptions

Among the Gupta rulers, the maximum number of inscriptions found are of Kumaragupta. His reign was marked by peace and prosperity, although in the later years, invasions by Pushyamitras and Hunas had begun.

ЁЯУМ
Important Facts (Exam Points)
  • Titles: Mahendraditya, Shakraditya, Ashwamedha-Mahendra.
  • Coins: Issued coins of the Peacock type (as the mount of Kartikeya).
  • Tumain Inscription: Kumaragupta is described as being like the 'autumn sun'.
  • Bilsad Inscription: The oldest inscription from the time of Kumaragupta.
